metadata.name: 2 in 1
metadata.description:
1/1 Edition

 This painting is from the series of ''portraits'' I have created.  If the winning bid is 1 ETH or higher, the collector will have the original (physical) painting!  The original painting is acrylic paint on a 90x90 cm 0.8 mm thick panel. It will be sent to the collector with a certificate of authenticity.

(Worldwide Cargo Express)

 Please make sure you have a social network such as Twitter or Instagram so I can contact you.

Bio  
Melih Polat is a contemporary artist who produces works in different disciplines such as painting, sculpture, ceramics, printing and NFT! More than 250 artworks of him are taking place in private collections in various countries of the world, especially in America, England, and France.

Melih Polat
